commit.message:
[NEW SUPERSET] deployment, permission and sql lab issue fixes (#86)

* superset deployment

* superset deployment

* superset deployment

* add permission

* fix permission

* fix home directory permission

* add entrypoint

* fix docker-init

* add database

* sql explorer issue fixes

* added superset permission

* fix permission

* added supervisord cli

* fix supervisor

* new-superset-deployment

* added default for max

* fix new dashboard

* updated env.sample file

* update readme

* fix import dashboard

* fix dataset permission

* remove version export

* fix celery beat

* fix celery beat query

* add health check

* remove filter flag

* change target path

* add userinfo

* Fix target Path Issue

* added stackoverflow links for some common errors

* fixed import dashboard

* fix datasets filter

* remove public role

* fix sql preview

* fix dashboard cache

* revert to cache warmup

* Update README.md

* removed menu item from header

* removed chart and dashboard email options

* commented unused code

* removed unused context menu items

* feat: PE-10493 New superset - Added Peak's custom security API (#94)

* changes for adding custom security api

* added constant

* temp changes

* reset debugging changes

* removed unused variables

* review changes

* removed unused provider from custom security api

* give permission to dashboard file

* fix command

* directory permission

* fix working directory

* fix dir permission

* fix css template error

* fix created date

Co-authored-by: Vishnu Agarwal <vishnu.agarwal@peak.ai>

Co-authored-by: mukulsaini <sainimukul49@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: sukhbir-singh <sukhbir947@gmail.com>
